text:
Hello KELA PAAJI..
BHai apni memories ek Memoir M nhi likhi Ja sakti Yaar. Bhai best padosi h tu...meri aero ki har problem ka solution tha tu.... Ultimate bakchod+Ultra chaapu londa h tu.
Bhai Khaega kela s leke .... IIMA k sir HR RAO tak ka transition dekha h bhai tera....
Bhai tujhme me asli IITIAN dikhta h.... Asli bakchod iitian. sale tujhe ditna congratulations bola h na
Pta nhi bhai kisi or londe ko bola hoga ki nhi but umeed karta hu ki kafi bar or bolu.
kaafi h bhai bs ... Ab tu mile ya na but dil m rahega hi humesha.
Long live sir HR Rao!!!
author: Naman  Jain

text:
Ha bhai chotuu.. kya hi likhu bro.
Tu to mera saathi h bhai ... cheers!
Milta rahio bhai ...
author: Naman  Jain

text:
Hi maitree,

College ke pehle hafte m hi mere room m tere charche ho rhe , kyu ? Kyuki mera jabaj londa @saurabh sharma  tujhe propose krke  aa chuka tha. 
Then i was like m bhi to dekhu ye kisse katwake aaya hğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚..But i also don't remember how i actually met you.

My opinions about you changed drastically over the 4 years ... But one opinion still remains...
"Ye sabka kategi and end m apna bhi katwaegi"ğŸ˜.

Franky speaking , i had a 'Bro' type interaction with you which i had only with a handful of people. And yes i always enjoyed it every time ; till the last semester when you actually became the Messiah of MA.KU.NA.HA and helped all three of us immensely. You will always be remembered for that.

For what its worth, i do like ur wierd nd cringe sense of humour ğŸ˜‚. You're from that flock of rare females jo bakchodi level set karte h .... Hagte hue chaapna kise kehte wo mene tujhse seekha h and believe me you are a pro at it. ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. 

The one and only time i stayed in GH was in ur room for that epic rolling session, one of a kind experience tha bhai wo ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚...i know ek hi roll tha bt bs mujhe hi pata h ki m kese chalke aapne room pr pahucha tha uske bad ğŸ˜ğŸ˜‚.
. 
Ofcourse i would never forget the day when we ran out of daaru sitting half drunk in oat & making plans ki agli bar to khamba laenge bcğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚... and then the epic katthak lesson you gave me.. sikh gya m ekdumğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. 

Haha i though ill not write much because already itne memoirs h bc kya hi farak padega but yes as you can see i couldn't stop. Last day tha to likh hi dia bc memoir.

You're amongst the handful of people from iitk that will stay in my heart throught out life.

Thanks for everything, keep crushing, keep achieving and keep breking the norms as you always did. Will see you soon hopefully ğŸ™‚
author: Naman  Jain

text:
Aha pandit boi.... mera pyara pehla roomate.
bhai tere liye ek perfect line h yaar...... " Kya s Kya Hogye dekhte dekhte".
Bhai IITK m agar mene sabse pehle kisi ka chutiya kata tha to wo tu tha bhai... bahut maza aya tha bhai. Nishita Jain banke jo bakchodi ki thi tere saath wo m kbhi nhi bhul paunga.
Bhai college aake agar sabse pehla koi dost mila tha to wo tu that bro.... dil m ek special jagah h bhai tere liye. college k 4 saalo m mene tera developement hote dega h bhai... aise codu bacche s leke top level bakchod tak tera developement hua h bhai.
maha ladki baaz aadmi h bhai tu isiliye or maza aata tha bhai tere sath. 
mere gharwalo k liye tu typical "sharma ji ka chaapu londa" h sale. Still bhai tujh jesa hard working bandha nhi dekha bro menw.
Ha gaurav sharma h bakchod but m bolunga saurabh sharma maha bakxhod. Zindgi bhar aise hi chaapte reh bhai. 
M kuch bhi bhul jau pr Nishita Jain or Teri Wo meethi meethi lusty chats nhi bhul paunga bro.
Bhl na jaio bc; bye bye
author: Naman  Jain

text:
Hello  Bro/Boi/Bandar/Roomie...
Bhai tumhare baare m kya hi kha jaaye... If i had been homo i would choose you any day :P
being your roomie for the two years made me realize ki tu kitna Mc h. Sala gaali bhi itne cute tarike s deta h bc ki hasi aajaye. 
My phone gallery has more photos of you than mine.... photos/videos of all category range form adult rating 1 to 10.
Bhai tum Bahut chaapu ho yaar bs thoda dara kam karo and just believe in Urself.
Your current knowledge level is what i would set as a goal for my lifetime.
I still have your 4am Peek a Boo pic,,lol. Still hasn't shown to anyone bro.
I wish you all the success bro.May god fulfill all your desires... and a girl would be the best start for that :P
Okay Bro, Roomies for life. you'll stay in my Heart.
author: Naman  Jain
